title: Núcleo de Estudantes de Comunicação e Multimédia
description: I was responsible for managing this project to completion and played a pivotal role in developing its backend and frontend. We used Laravel and Vue.

title: Red Dead Roleplay UCP - Retired
description: Collaborative project, building a user control panel for this community boasting hundreds of players. I contributed with code and developed the website’s design. The server was closed and as such the UCP is no longer available.
